description: '''Cornelio Reyna Cisneros''' (September 16, 1940 – January 22, 1997) was a [[Mexicans|Mexican]] singer, composer, bajo sextist and actor. He made over 60 recordings of [[Norteño (music)|Norteño]] and [[Mariachi]] music. He was the lead vocalist for the group "Los Relámpagos del Norte" (The Lightning Bolts of The North). Reyna was considered a native of the city of [[Reynosa, Tamaulipas]] due to his great affection for the city and that his career grew there. As an actor, Reyna appeared in some 30 films about Mexican popular culture.
